com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store

Class DBOpenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.DBOpenHelper

  • public class DBOpenHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Helper class to manage SmartStore's database creation and version management.

      • getOpenHelpers

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DBOpenHelper> getOpenHelpers()
        Returns a map of all DBOpenHelper instances created. The key is the database name and the value is the instance itself.
        Returns:
        Map of DBOpenHelper instances.

      • getOpenHelper

        public static DBOpenHelper getOpenHelper(Context ctx,
                                         UserAccount account,
                                         java.lang.String communityId)
        Returns the DBOpenHelper instance associated with this user and community.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        account - User account.
        communityId - Community ID.
        Returns:
        DBOpenHelper instance.

      • getOpenHelper

        public static DBOpenHelper getOpenHelper(Context ctx,
                                         java.lang.String dbNamePrefix,
                                         UserAccount account,
                                         java.lang.String communityId)
        Returns the DBOpenHelper instance for the given database name.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        dbNamePrefix - The database name. This must be a valid file name without a filename extension such as ".db".
        account - User account. If this method is called before authentication, we will simply return the smart store DB, which is not associated with any user account. Otherwise, we will return a unique database at the community level.
        communityId - Community ID.
        Returns:
        DBOpenHelper instance.

        Deletes the underlying database for the specified user and community.

        ctx - Context.
        dbNamePrefix - The database name. This must be a valid file name without a filename extension such as ".db".
        account - User account.
        communityId - Community ID.

      • deleteAllUserDatabases

        public static void deleteAllUserDatabases(Context ctx)
        Deletes all remaining authenticated databases. We pass in the key prefix for an organization here, because all authenticated DBs will have to go against an org, which means the org ID will be a part of the DB name. This prevents the global DBs from being removed.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.

      • deleteAllDatabases

        public static void deleteAllDatabases(Context ctx,
                                      UserAccount userAccount)
        Deletes all databases of given user.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        userAccount - User account.

      • smartStoreExists

        public static boolean smartStoreExists(Context ctx,
                                       UserAccount account,
                                       java.lang.String communityId)
        Determines if a smart store currently exists for the given account and/or community id.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        account - User account.
        communityId - Community ID.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if a smartstore already exists.

      • smartStoreExists

        public static boolean smartStoreExists(Context ctx,
                                       java.lang.String dbNamePrefix,
                                       UserAccount account,
                                       java.lang.String communityId)
        Determines if a smart store currently exists for the given database name, account and/or community id.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context.
        dbNamePrefix - The database name. This must be a valid file name without a filename extension such as ".db".
        account - User account.
        communityId - Community ID.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if a smartstore already exists.

      • getExternalSoupBlobsPath

        public java.lang.String getExternalSoupBlobsPath(java.lang.String soupTableName)
        Returns the path to external blobs folder for the given soup in this db. If no soup is provided, the db folder is returned.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Name of the soup for which to get external blobs folder.
        Returns:
        Path to external blobs folder for the given soup. If no soup is provided, the parent directory is returned.

      • getSizeOfDir

        public int getSizeOfDir(java.io.File subDir)
        Recursively determines size of all files in the given subdirectory of the soup storage.
        Parameters:
        subDir - Subdirectory to determine size of. Use null for top-level directory.
        Returns:
        Size of all files in all subdirectories.

      • removeAllFiles

        public static boolean removeAllFiles(java.io.File dir)
        Removes all files and folders in the given directory recursively as well as removes itself.
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to remove all files and folders recursively.
        Returns:
        True if all delete operations were successful. False otherwise.

      • createExternalBlobsDirectory

        public boolean createExternalBlobsDirectory(java.lang.String soupTableName)
        Creates the folder for external blobs for the given soup name.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup for which to create the external blobs folder
        Returns:
        True if directory was created, false otherwise.

      • removeExternalBlobsDirectory

        public boolean removeExternalBlobsDirectory(java.lang.String soupTableName)
        Removes the folder for external blobs for the given soup name.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup for which to remove the external blobs folder
        Returns:
        True if directory was removed, false otherwise.

      • changeKey

        public static void changeKey(SQLiteDatabase db,
                             java.lang.String oldKey,
                             java.lang.String newKey)
        Changes the encryption key on the database.
        Parameters:
        db - Database object.
        oldKey - Old encryption key.
        newKey - New encryption key.

      • reEncryptAllFiles

        public static void reEncryptAllFiles(SQLiteDatabase db,
                                     java.lang.String oldKey,
                                     java.lang.String newKey)
        Re-encrypts the files on external storage with the new key. If external storage is not enabled for any table in the db, this operation is ignored.
        Parameters:
        db - DB containing external storage (if applicable).
        oldKey - Old key with which to decrypt the existing data.
        newKey - New key with which to encrypt the existing data.

      • saveSoupBlob

        public boolean saveSoupBlob(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                            long soupEntryId,
                            JSONObject soupElt,
                            java.lang.String encryptionKey)
        Places the soup blob on file storage. The name and folder are determined by the soup and soup entry id.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Name of the soup that the blob belongs to.
        soupEntryId - Entry id for the soup blob.
        soupElt - Blob to store on file storage in JSON format.
        encryptionKey - Key with which to encrypt the data.
        Returns:
        True if operation was successful, false otherwise.

      • saveSoupBlobFromString

        public boolean saveSoupBlobFromString(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                                      long soupEntryId,
                                      java.lang.String soupEltStr,
                                      java.lang.String encryptionKey)
        Places the soup blob on file storage. The name and folder are determined by the soup and soup entry id.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Name of the soup that the blob belongs to.
        soupEntryId - Entry id for the soup blob.
        soupEltStr - Blob to store on file storage as a String.
        encryptionKey - Key with which to encrypt the data.
        Returns:
        True if operation was successful, false otherwise.

      • loadSoupBlob

        public JSONObject loadSoupBlob(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                               long soupEntryId,
                               java.lang.String encryptionKey)
        Retrieves the soup blob for the given soup entry id from file storage.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup name to which the blob belongs.
        soupEntryId - Entry id for the requested soup blob.
        encryptionKey - Key with which to decrypt the data.
        Returns:
        The blob from file storage represented as JSON. Returns null if there was an error.

      • loadSoupBlobAsString

        public java.lang.String loadSoupBlobAsString(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                                             long soupEntryId,
                                             java.lang.String encryptionKey)
        Retrieves the soup blob for the given soup entry id from file storage.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup name to which the blob belongs.
        soupEntryId - Entry id for the requested soup blob.
        encryptionKey - Key with which to decrypt the data.
        Returns:
        The blob from file storage represented as String. Returns null if there was an error.

      • removeSoupBlob

        public boolean removeSoupBlob(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                              java.lang.Long[] soupEntryIds)
        Removes the blobs represented by the given list of soup entry ids from external storage.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup name to which the blobs belong.
        soupEntryIds - List of soup entry ids to delete.
        Returns:
        True if all soup entry ids were deleted, false if blob could not be found or had an error.

      • getSoupBlobFile

        public java.io.File getSoupBlobFile(java.lang.String soupTableName,
                                    long soupEntryId)
        Returns a file that the soup data is stored in for the given soup name and entry id.
        Parameters:
        soupTableName - Soup name to which the blob belongs.
        soupEntryId - Entry id for the requested soup blob.
        Returns:
        A File representing the soup blob in external storage.
